summary: An ordinance providing for the modification and distribution of certain local improvement assessments against the North one-half of Tract 40, except the East 33 feet, Plat of Alki Point, which assessments were levied for the condemnation of West Wait Street and West Spokane Street, as authorized by Ordinance No. 29062 and 39638, respectively, and the improvement of 63rd Avenue Southwest, by Trunk Sewer, and Admiral Way, by Grading, as authorized by Ordinances Nos. 39803 and 34174, respectively.
